data.text: @ShellFortune You're so not a shitty person hun! Anytime. I saw that on Facebook ages ago and thought it was a good thing to remember (or near as dammit! My memory isn't great!!) You're the queen in your life, other's ugliness mustn't tarnish you.Throw out the trash, keep the good xx
@ArmyCoreyTaylor xoxo Thank you.. I NEEDED THAT.. cuz i feel like a shitty person today..
@ShellFortune Anytime x Some people truly  do =shit! But don't let their ugliness tarnish your beauty. Some people are like sanding paper, by the time they're done they're useless but you still shine
@ArmyCoreyTaylor Thanks LOVE .... some people are really f*cking assholes.,. doesn't matter if you known them 30 years or 1 week... I AM SO ANGRY..
